page.title: 17St Philips Church Werrington
page.content: St Philip's Church is of Church of England denomination.This church was built in 1907.There are no plans for extensions to the church. The parish has 5000 people and there are about 70 major ceremonies each year eg.Weddings,Funerals,etc.On Sundays the average attendances are holy communion 20-25,main service,Sunday school 100, evening service is 40. There is only one other chapel in the parish(Werrington methodist chapel). There are 14 in the choir.The church has stained glass windows.The vestry was built in 1962.The church is constructed to hold 180 people.The church belonged to Caverswall Parish at first,but now has its own parish.The church belongs to the Cheadle deanery. This church has links with South America,Africa,the church army,the tear fund and the leprosy mission.
